creator: scottstirling@rcn.com
text:
This example:

Example of merge
<jpcovreport home="c:\jprobe" tofile="merge.jpc" verbose="true">
  <fileset dir="./snapshots">
    <include name="snap*.jpc"/>
  </fileset>
</jpcovreport>

Should show jpcovmerge instead of jpcovreport.
Fixed in CVS HEAD. Thanks for the report.
creator: sbailliez@apache.org
